channel.title: Berky-Scape Problem!
channel.description: Hello I have download the berky-scape server and client It work but i want to make myself owner and some friends admin Can anyone tell how i can do that

item.title: Berky-Scape Problem!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Your Master, post:8, topic:273563”][quote author=Newty link=topic=361491.msg2748969#msg2748969 date=1239801875]

[quote author=Your Master link=topic=361491.msg2748965#msg2748965 date=1239801829]

Log in to the server. Log out. Open character folder. Open your character file. Change player rights to 1 (mod), 2 (admin), 3 (owner).
[/quote]Actually its not correct, i know loads of 508’s. In 508’s you cannot use right “3” the max is 2.

He never said weather he was using a 508 or a 317.
[/quote]Actually he said “Berky-scape” Berky scape are 508, cant you read?[/quote]
Orly?

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Also, I doubt you know ‘loads’ about 508’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Berky-Scape Problem!
item.dc:creator: @Rii0N Rii0N
item.description:
@Rii0N wrote:

in the same file where the run.bat or runserver.bat theres a build.bat. right click and edit it. change the JDK version to your version save and close then double click it and wait for it to say ‘press any key to continue…’

Read full topic

item.title: Berky-Scape Problem!
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Your Master, post:8, topic:273563”][quote author=Newty link=topic=361491.msg2748969#msg2748969 date=1239801875]

[quote author=Your Master link=topic=361491.msg2748965#msg2748965 date=1239801829]

Log in to the server. Log out. Open character folder. Open your character file. Change player rights to 1 (mod), 2 (admin), 3 (owner).
[/quote]Actually its not correct, i know loads of 508’s. In 508’s you cannot use right “3” the max is 2.

He never said weather he was using a 508 or a 317.
[/quote]Actually he said “Berky-scape” Berky scape are 508, cant you read?[/quote]

If I have never touched a 508 (never downloaded). How would I know that “Berkey-Scape” is a 508 server…?

Read full topic

item.title: Berky-Scape Problem!
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Rii0N:

Look for a file called io then open it and open login.java (text file) press ctrl+f type in berky and hit ‘find’. Replace his name with yours. Be sure only to use all small letters. No CAPS or it wont give you the rights.

thats close ok m8 go here508\508\Bulby\io open up “login.java(with notepad)” do “crtl f” find berky or you can do “crtl h” and on top bar put in berky and bottem your username and replace everthing that has to do with berky. hope this helps.

Read full topic
